Class wgCriticalSectionSet

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<wgCriticalSection>
java.util.AbstractList<wgCriticalSection>
java.util.Vector<wgCriticalSection>
workloadgenerator.wgCriticalSectionSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<wgCriticalSection>, Collection<wgCriticalSection>, List<wgCriticalSection>, RandomAccess, SequencedCollection<wgCriticalSection>
public class wgCriticalSectionSet extends Vector<wgCriticalSection>
A collection of generated critical sections for a workload task.

This class manages a list of wgCriticalSection objects, provides nesting queries (find sections under/above others), supports expanding critical sections to meet configured totals, and keeps track of used resources. Inline Chinese comments that explain nesting and selection behavior have been integrated into the method descriptions.

Author:
YC

  • Field Details

    • parent

      public wgTask parent
      Back-reference to the owning wgTask for which these critical sections are generated. Generator code navigates through this parent to access workload-level settings (e.g., CSR bounds and accuracy scaling).

  • Constructor Details

    • wgCriticalSectionSet

      public wgCriticalSectionSet(wgTask p)

  • Method Details

    • getCriticalSectionUnder

      public wgCriticalSection getCriticalSectionUnder(double time, String timeisSorE)
      Find the smallest (innermost) critical section that contains the given time.
      Parameters:
      time - the time to query (export-scaled units expected by callers)
      timeisSorE - "S" to treat time as start-time inclusion rule or "E" for end-time inclusion
      Returns:
      an inner wgCriticalSection that contains time, or null if none

    • getCriticalSectionUnder

      public wgCriticalSection getCriticalSectionUnder(double time, String timeisSorE, Vector<wgCriticalSection> csSet)
      Search within a provided csSet for the smallest critical section enclosing time.
      Parameters:
      time - the time value to test
      timeisSorE - "S" or "E" deciding the inclusive bounds used in the test
      csSet - the vector of wgCriticalSection to search
      Returns:
      the matched wgCriticalSection or null when none matches

    • getCriticalSectionUnder

      public wgCriticalSection getCriticalSectionUnder(wgCriticalSection wgCS)
      Find one critical section that is directly above the given wgCriticalSection in the nesting hierarchy (i.e., the smallest parent). Returns null when the provided wgCS is at the outermost level.
      Parameters:
      wgCS - non-null wgCriticalSection to query
      Returns:
      a wgCriticalSection that contains wgCS, or null if none

    • getCriticalSectionSetOn

      public Vector<wgCriticalSection> getCriticalSectionSetOn(wgCriticalSection criticalSection)
      Return the set of critical sections that are directly above the provided criticalSection (i.e., its siblings in the parent level). Passing null returns the top-level critical sections.
      Parameters:
      criticalSection - the reference wgCriticalSection (may be null)
      Returns:
      a Vector of wgCriticalSection in the requested level, sorted by start time

    • zoomInCriticalSection

      public void zoomInCriticalSection()
      Expand randomly selected critical sections (either start or end) until the accumulated critical section time reaches the configured minimum. This method mutates critical section boundaries and updates totals.

    • addCriticalSection

      public void addCriticalSection(wgCriticalSection cs)
      Add a critical section to this set and record its resource usage. Updates the cached total critical section time accordingly.
      Parameters:
      cs - the critical section to add

    • removeCriticalSection

      public void removeCriticalSection(wgCriticalSection cs)
      Remove a critical section from this set and release its resource from the used list. Updates the cached total critical section time.
      Parameters:
      cs - the critical section to remove

    • setMaxCriticalSectionTime

      public void setMaxCriticalSectionTime(long time)
      Set the maximum accumulated critical section time for this task. Typically computed as CSR(max) * job computation time (see inline note).
      Parameters:
      time - maximum total CS time in internal units

    • setMinCriticalSectionTime

      public void setMinCriticalSectionTime(long time)
      Set the minimum accumulated critical section time for this task.
      Parameters:
      time - minimum total CS time in internal units

    • getCriticalSection

      public wgCriticalSection getCriticalSection(int i)
      Return the wgCriticalSection at the given index.
      Parameters:
      i - zero-based index
      Returns:
      the critical section instance

    • getUnusedResources

      public wgResources getUnusedResources()
      Return one unused resource group from the workload, if any.
      Returns:
      a wgResources not yet used in this set; null when none available

    • getCriticalSectionSetHeader

      public String getCriticalSectionSetHeader()
      Header key string used for the criticalSections element during export.
      Returns:
      the header key for the set

    • getMaxCriticalSectionTime

      public long getMaxCriticalSectionTime()
      Return the configured maximum total CS time.
      Returns:
      maximum CS time in internal units

    • getMinCriticalSectionTime

      public long getMinCriticalSectionTime()
      Return the configured minimum total CS time.
      Returns:
      minimum CS time in internal units

    • getTotalCriticalSectionTime

      public long getTotalCriticalSectionTime()
      Return the current total CS time accumulated by the (top-level) set.
      Returns:
      total CS time in internal units
